TABLE.NAME: qrhunt
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the qrhunt activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: cluetext
FIELD.COMMENT: Text of a clue where to find the QR code

FIELD.NAME: answer
FIELD.COMMENT: Answer that is displayed when QR code is scanned

FIELD.NAME: answertimestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the user submitted the answer

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: Start time of the user's attempt

FIELD.NAME: time_taken
FIELD.COMMENT: Time taken by the user to complete the activity

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to the Moodle user table

FIELD.NAME: activityid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to the activity table

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the Moodle user table

KEY.NAME: activityid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the activity table

TABLE.NAME: qrhunt_activity_completion
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for checking users activity completion

FIELD.NAME: completed
FIELD.COMMENT: A flag indicating whether the activity has been completed (1) or not (0).

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the activity was completed
